messages.message: can we turn on flash for analyze as well?

Hey, it's on our radar @bharath.raj! Don't have a plan for this just yet but tracking a plan for a plan in Q3: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4612

Happy to circle back on this when we have more clarity! (should be soon)
Tested Flash and Pro for Converse, but in chat like use-cases did not see too much gain at the time. So temper expectations ;)

Analyze is more dependent on the quality of the RAG system (query preprocessing, chunking, embeddings, indexation metadata, vector dB, quantisation, retrieval mode and hyperparameters, (re)ranking, ...) than the final LLM call compiling the result based on the retrieved context.
Unless you can cram the whole context in memory, but still there is this `context rot` phenomenon that we should take into account
Does analyze currently process on OCR output or will it decide depending on context?
@margaret.tomaszczuk  Do we have bandwidth to include Multimodal RAG for Analyze in Q3? :) At least a prototype with results on the benchmark?

For use cases we have with PowerPoints and graphics etc it’s not parsing well, think it’s because of the OCR even when doing table detection. We’ve got some market signal from both healthcare and M&A and legal that this could drive adoption of Analyze
@jordy.vlan this approach(https://github.com/ag2ai/SimpleDoc) you mentioned sometime back could perform better for powerpoint usecases?
@jordy.vlan we have an initiative to explore on the improvements to exiting multistep pipeline. We are yet to scope the work.
